content: CFS-T SSF transit frames Transit frames for fitting firestop modules to seal cable/pipe penetrations – with flange for welding or bolting to steel bulkheads and decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in corrosion-resistant coated steel (grade S235 JR) and stainless steel (1.4571/A4 (DIN 17456 or AISI 316Ti)) Available with single- and multiple-frame windows in various sizes within a single-row frame Part of a modular, easily modifiable cable transit system for sealing multi-cable transits (MCT) Applications Sealing penetrations in shipbuilding and offshore applications Sealing penetrations in wind power structures ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -40 - 122 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1): E Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 122 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) | Reaction to fire class (EN 13501-1) | E | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2263780 - Transit frame CFS-T SSF-6x1 MSP - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T SSF 6x1 St Firestop frame assy
